channel.title: Proper Smoking
channel.description: Proper Football & Smokin’ Blountz chat about LOL (but with lol’s) whilst enjoying the delights of the Earth.
channel.itunes:author: League of Levels
channel.itunes:subtitle: Proper Football & Smokin’ Blountz chat about LOL (but with lol’s) whilst enjoying the delights of the Earth.
channel.itunes:summary: Proper Football & Smokin’ Blountz chat about LOL (but with lol’s) whilst enjoying the delights of the Earth.

item.title: Episode #11
item.description: In this episode Blountz finally sips from the goblet of victory having donkeyed Proper with his own players. We discuss low numbers of scores and high numbers of shootings and Proper chats about NVL and why he loves Battle Black!
item.itunes:subtitle: In this episode Blountz finally sips from the goblet of victory having donkeyed Proper with his own players. We discuss low numbers of scores and high numbers of shootings and Proper chats about NVL and why he loves Battle Black!
item.itunes:summary: In this episode Blountz finally sips from the goblet of victory having donkeyed Proper with his own players. We discuss low numbers of scores and high numbers of shootings and Proper chats about NVL and why he loves Battle Black!

item.title: Episode #10
item.description: In this our 10th (that’s right, TENTH) episode Proper has the Commish in his sights as he takes aim at the misinformation spewing from his failing Farm podcast. We have sniped the legend himself Blitzed on to join us in talking about our teams/dynamic scheduling, the Sportsbook drama, and how the LOL pod used to be great.
item.itunes:subtitle: In this our 10th (that’s right, TENTH) episode Proper has the Commish in his sights as he takes aim at the misinformation spewing from his failing Farm podcast. We have sniped the legend himself Blitzed on to join us in talking about our teams/dynamic scheduling, the Sportsbook drama, and how the LOL pod used to be great.
item.itunes:summary: In this our 10th (that’s right, TENTH) episode Proper has the Commish in his sights as he takes aim at the misinformation spewing from his failing Farm podcast. We have sniped the legend himself Blitzed on to join us in talking about our teams/dynamic scheduling, the Sportsbook drama, and how the LOL pod used to be great.

item.title: Episode #9
item.description: In this bumper 1 hour episode the boys are joined by the only other active 2-time Champion High Decibels as they discuss D.C. shenanigans and all of the porn films that Jim Brown was in.
item.itunes:subtitle: In this bumper 1 hour episode the boys are joined by the only other active 2-time Champion High Decibels as they discuss D.C. shenanigans and all of the porn films that Jim Brown was in.
item.itunes:summary: In this bumper 1 hour episode the boys are joined by the only other active 2-time Champion High Decibels as they discuss D.C. shenanigans and all of the porn films that Jim Brown was in.

item.title: Episode #8
item.description: In this episode Proper & Smokin’ talk victimhood. That’s literally it.
item.itunes:subtitle: In this episode Proper & Smokin’ talk victimhood. That’s literally it.
item.itunes:summary: In this episode Proper & Smokin’ talk victimhood. That’s literally it.

item.title: Episode #7
item.description: In this episode Proper embarrasses himself with his lack of geographical latitude knowledge after the boys deep dive their trade as well as what the podcast is supposed to be called. They finish up by revisiting their 1st EVER SLFFL rosters.
item.itunes:subtitle: In this episode Proper embarrasses himself with his lack of geographical latitude knowledge after the boys deep dive their trade as well as what the podcast is supposed to be called. They finish up by revisiting their 1st EVER SLFFL rosters.
item.itunes:summary: In this episode Proper embarrasses himself with his lack of geographical latitude knowledge after the boys deep dive their trade as well as what the podcast is supposed to be called. They finish up by revisiting their 1st EVER SLFFL rosters.

item.title: Episode #6
item.description: In this episode Proper is predictably demure and self-effacing when it comes to the subject of his record setting Week 3 victories, and the boys talk trades and emotional roster damage.
item.itunes:subtitle: In this episode Proper is predictably demure and self-effacing when it comes to the subject of his record setting Week 3 victories, and the boys talk trades and emotional roster damage.
item.itunes:summary: In this episode Proper is predictably demure and self-effacing when it comes to the subject of his record setting Week 3 victories, and the boys talk trades and emotional roster damage.

item.title: Episode #5
item.description: In this episode we are rejoined by DangerCrazy as we pre-game for the big league TNF meetup in D.C. - we talk about Nuke ‘Em’s big heart, FAAB insurance and a reminisce about former Jets/Patriots players - sponsored by DuoLingo…
item.itunes:subtitle: In this episode we are rejoined by DangerCrazy as we pre-game for the big league TNF meetup in D.C. - we talk about Nuke ‘Em’s big heart, FAAB insurance and a reminisce about former Jets/Patriots players - sponsored by DuoLingo…

item.title: Episode #4
item.description: In this bonus representative episode we celebrate Mexican Independence Day with guest DangerCrazy DC and talk about how both he and Blountz got their asses beat like piñatas by TFM who put up “elote” points..
item.itunes:subtitle: In this bonus representative episode we celebrate Mexican Independence Day with guest DangerCrazy DC and talk about how both he and Blountz got their asses beat like piñatas by TFM who put up “elote” points..

item.title: Episode #3
item.description: Proper & Blountz spill some tea whilst edibles and James Jones’ Benjamin do their work. Proper continues his praise of the Commissioner who we can all agree is doing a fantastically succinct job.
item.itunes:subtitle: Proper & Blountz spill some tea whilst edibles and James Jones’ Benjamin do their work. Proper continues his praise of the Commissioner who we can all agree is doing a fantastically succinct job.

item.title: Episode #2
item.description: Proper & Bountz talk dregs, useless tag team partners, Best League drama, Proper links his connect live on the pod whilst Blountz vamps, and it's all ruined by a mouse.
item.itunes:subtitle: Proper & Bountz talk dregs, useless tag team partners, Best League drama, Proper links his connect live on the pod whilst Blountz vamps, and it's all ruined by a mouse.
item.itunes:summary: Proper & Bountz talk dregs, useless tag team partners, Best League drama, Proper links his connect live on the pod whilst Blountz vamps, and it's all ruined by a mouse.

item.title: Episode #1
item.description: On the inaugural episode of the Proper Smoking Podcast, Proper talks over Blountz with his overly loud mic as they discuss some LOL history, the Draft, our own lineups, Toxic Hollow’s inevitable resurgence and Titans running backs. Time to boo the Comissioner.
item.itunes:subtitle: On the inaugural episode of the Proper Smoking Podcast, Proper talks over Blountz with his overly loud mic as they discuss some LOL history, the Draft, our own lineups, Toxic Hollow’s inevitable resurgence and Titans running backs. Time to boo the Comissioner.
